abstract: Puerto Rican officials say that proposed $450 million natural gas pipeline is crucial to reducing electricity costs for the island and reviving its economy, but opponents argue that the environmental impact will be too great.
snippet: Officials say a proposed natural gas pipeline is crucial to reducing energy costs and reviving the economy. But opponents say the environmental impact will be too great.
lead_paragraph: Officials say a proposed natural gas pipeline is crucial to reducing energy costs and reviving the economy. But opponents say the environmental impact will be too great.

headline.main: Puerto Rico’s Plan for Gas Pipeline Has Many Critics
headline.print_headline: Puerto Rico’s Plan For Gas Pipeline Has Many Critics
headline.seo: Puerto Rico’s Plan for Gas Pipeline Has Many Critics
